# Package Usage

This section shows how to use the package.

## Instalation

The package can be installed using `devtools`.

```
install.packages("devtools")
require("devtools")
install_github("thalesmello/segmentr")
```

## Usage

The package can be used with the `segment` function.

```{r}
require("segmentr")

data <- rbind(
  c(1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1),
  c(1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1),
  c(1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1),
  c(1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1),
  c(1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1),
  c(1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1)
)

segment(data, algorithm = "exact", penalty = function(X) (0.1 * 2^ncol(X)) * log(nrow(X)))$changepoints
```
